participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves to play and explore.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
